text: Vincent Francis "Vince" Callahan Jr. (October 30, 1931 â€“ September 20, 2014) was an American politician. He served for 40 years as a member of the Virginia House of Delegates. From January 1968 to January 2008, he represented the 34th district in the Virginia House of Delegates. At the time of his retirement, he was the longest-serving Republican in the Virginia General Assembly. On September 20, 2014, Callahan died of West Nile virus at the age of 82.Vince Callahan-obituaryNotice of death of Vince Callahan , wusa9.com; accessed September 20, 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== *Bio, courtesy of the Virginia General Assembly Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from West Nile virus Category:Infectious disease deaths in Virginia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C.
title: Vince Callahan
